details.sample_response:
Climate change is one of the most pressing challenges of our time. Here's what you need to know:

🌡️...

issues: Using fallback mode - IBM credentials may be invalid

OpenWeather.limitations: Point-in-time data, weather forecast accuracy decreases over time

Carbon Interface.methodology: EPA emission factors and industry standards
Carbon Interface.limitations: Estimates based on averages, actual emissions may vary

NASA POWER.limitations: Modeled data, may not reflect micro-climate conditions

Climate TRACE.methodology: Satellite data, AI analysis, ground truth
Climate TRACE.limitations: Beta API, some data gaps, methodology evolving

World Bank.limitations: Annual data, reporting delays, country data quality varies

UN SDG.limitations: Reporting frequency varies, data availability gaps

IBM Watson.methodology: Large language model trained on diverse data
IBM Watson.limitations: May generate plausible but incorrect information, requires verification

fallback_systems.description: When APIs are unavailable, the system uses pre-calculated estimates
fallback_systems.data_sources: IPCC reports, EPA data, scientific literature
fallback_systems.transparency: Clearly marked as estimates when fallback is used
fallback_systems.limitations: Static data, may not reflect current conditions

data_validation.range_checks: Automatic validation of data ranges (e.g., temperature, emissions)
data_validation.quality_indicators: Data quality scores based on source reliability and validation
data_validation.error_handling: Graceful degradation with clear error messages

recommendations.recommendation: Implement robust fallback systems and API health monitoring

recommendations.issue: Carbon Interface has data quality issues
recommendations.recommendation: Implement data validation and cleaning for Carbon Interface

recommendations.issue: NASA POWER has data quality issues
recommendations.recommendation: Implement data validation and cleaning for NASA POWER

recommendations.issue: IBM Watson has data quality issues
recommendations.recommendation: Implement data validation and cleaning for IBM Watson

recommendations.issue: Long response times for some APIs
recommendations.recommendation: Implement caching and background data updates

recommendations.issue: Users may not understand data sources
recommendations.recommendation: Add data source indicators and quality scores to UI
Implement dashboard for API status and data quality metrics
